dcterms:description: TNL2K is a newly introduced benchmark designed for VL tracking that offers a large-scale dataset containing 2,000 video sequences. It stands out due to several desirable features: high quality, adversarial samples, and significant appearance variation.
dcterms:title: TNL2K

dcterms:creator: Zhenyang Li
Ran Tao
Efstratios Gavves
Cees GM Snoek
Arnold WM Smeulders
dcterms:description: The OTB99 dataset stands as the pioneering VL tracking dataset, which is relatively small-scale with only 51 videos for training and 48 videos for testing.
dcterms:title: OTB99

dcterms:creator: Heng Fan
Liting Lin

Sijia Yu

Yong Xu
Chunyuan Liao
Haibin Ling
dcterms:description: LaSOT is a comprehensive benchmark consisting of long sequences for visual tracking, whose primary challenge lies in the robustness of long-term tracking.
dcterms:title: LaSOT
